name: Tea Stall
description: A small tapri near bus stop, selling chai and biscuits.

description: Earns from selling pan, gutka, and snacks.

description: Daily income from selling seasonal fruits on roadside.

description: Renting cycles to school students and villagers.

name: Namkeen Stall
description: Sells samosa, kachori, and local snacks.
